content.formatted_body: Looking some more at PR 41, it's not clear what to do in NewPromiseReactionJob if the handler is empty and the promise capability is not undefined

IIRC this would be the case with something like

const delayedRejection = new Promise((_, reject) => {
  setTimeout(reject, 1000);
}).then();
